* Planned features: *
 * Use magnetic north sensor
 * Screensaver disable & autodisable
 * Waypoint monitor
 * Track display & recording (use server backend)
 * Route display & editing
 * Route & Track monitoring
 * Gauge options & more gauge info (average speed, descent/ascent distance, select units)

* Future: *
 * Create a plugin architecture to enable 3rd party widgets/layouts/events
